results.title: Effect of amlodipine-atorvastatin combination on fibrinolysis in hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patients with insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The positive effect on fibrinolytic balance and @CHEMICAL_DDP_BLM_protocol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038809 @@@BP@@@ control observed suggests that in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Cognitive_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D060825 @@@impaired fibrinolysis@@@, the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ could be the treatment of choice.

citations.NLM: Fogari R, Derosa G, Lazzari P, Zoppi A, Fogari E, Rinaldi A, Mugellini A. Effect of amlodipine-atorvastatin combination on fibrinolysis in hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patients with insulin resistance. Am J Hypertens. 2004 Sep;17(9):823-7. PMID: 15363826

results.title: [Transcutaneous oximetry in smokers with moderate hypertension and peripheral arterial disease treated with amlodipine and defibrotide, also with total smoking cessation].
results.text_hl: The total suspension for a period of 4 months from smoking associated with a Ca-antagonist such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and an hemorheological, antithrombotic drug such as @CHEMICAL_defibrotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C036901 @@@defibrotide@@@ together could bring about an improvement on the treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and a notable reduction in the risks linked to the complications found in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensives@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@PAOD II type a

citations.NLM: Cicco G, Dolce E, Gigante G, Pirrelli A. [Transcutaneous oximetry in smokers with moderate hypertension and peripheral arterial disease treated with amlodipine and defibrotide, also with total smoking cessation]. Minerva Cardioangiol. 1995 Oct;43(10):423-8. PMID: 8819809

results.title: Amlodipine treatment decreases plasma and carotid artery tissue levels of endothelin-1 in atherosclerotic rabbits.
results.text_hl: After 8 weeks all animals were anesthetized and blood or carotid tissue samples were colleted. Eight weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treatment reduced significantly total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@, LDL and @CHEMICAL_Thioguanine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013866 @@@TG@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ (HA) group.

citations.NLM: Rashidi B, Mohammadi M, Mirzaei F, Badalzadeh R, Reisi P. Amlodipine treatment decreases plasma and carotid artery tissue levels of endothelin-1 in atherosclerotic rabbits. Pathophysiology. 2011 Apr;18(2):137-42. PMID: 20541920

results.title: Synergistic effect of amlodipine and atorvastatin on blood pressure, left ventricular remodeling, and C-reactive protein in hypertensive patients with primary hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: The positive effect suggests that in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ could be the treatment of choice.
